name: beatbot
description: - Check if logged in, if logged in take to user profile, if not logged in take them to /login (or keep on index, but display login/create an account box) - When a user is on their profile they should see their playlist names (songs in playlist, will be in a collapsed div that can expand) - Search box can change between song, album or artist - API's to add: Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud, iTunes, LastFM, etc.. (choose 3?) - Setting up routes, gets, posts, handlebars (layouts w/ dynamic code) - Any public files can go in the public folder - Add a view for public vs private users (if user says public, than anyone can type in users name and see playlists, but not edit, etc..)
